column4: i all...looking for someone in frankfurt main...need help with linux ubuntu...i am a windows user and want to switch the platform  and of cause not for fee
are you wanting to dual boot or just a standard install?
are you sure your hardware is linux compatible
please add my name before your messages
so ppl know you are being helped and it organizes the chats
ok  this is damm fast here to follow
to add and remove programs use Add and Remove Programs in the "Programs" list
did you get my last message?
i tryed everything...all i need is someone to install wine winamp and a ..sorry fucking streamripper  thats all i need
to install winamp just download their installer and run it, if it asks for a progarm to run it, select Wine, if not in the list just type it.
or to install streamripper, open a terminal and type: sudo apt-get install streamripper
yepp i tryed but as a windows user it confuses me total i dont even know where downloads are after downloading  i am a total new linux user
if you are using firefox, the downloads should be downloaded to your desktop
just click the icon on the desktop twice
in Firefox download manager right click and click "Show in Folder"
I have no idea, please post your question again and see if someone else can help you, I'm not in linux right now so I can't help as much as I want to.
